As expected from the center of the world,"},{"lineNumber":121963,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々な逸話を持つつわもの共が集まるわい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"many warriors with various anecdotes gather here!\""},{"lineNumber":121964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人討伐隊なんぞに参加させられて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Having been forced to join the Demon Slayer Squad,"},{"lineNumber":121965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初はなんてことにと嘆いたもんじゃが、","translatedEnglishLine":"I initially lamented 'what have I gotten into?', but"},{"lineNumber":121966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取材と考えればこの環境も悪くない」","translatedEnglishLine":"thinking of it as research, this environment isn't bad.\""},{"lineNumber":121967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、むしろサイコー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's actually awesome!\""},{"lineNumber":121968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「小説家ってのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are novelists all such eccentrics?\""},{"lineNumber":121969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんなこんな変人なのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are they all this weird?\""},{"lineNumber":121970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、とても立派だと思いますよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I think they're very admirable, you know?"},{"lineNumber":121971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　前向きで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Positive...\""},{"lineNumber":121972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおっ！　そうじゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh! Exactly!\""},{"lineNumber":121973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「坊主、あのパットンとも知り合いなんじゃろ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Boy, you know Patton as well, right?\""},{"lineNumber":121974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、パットンを知ってるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You know Patton?\""},{"lineNumber":121975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂、パットンの先祖である偉人、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am a big fan of Zanages Herman,"},{"lineNumber":121976,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ザナゲス・ヘルマンの大ファンでのう」","translatedEnglishLine":"the great ancestor of Patton.\""},{"lineNumber":121977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ファンすぎて主役にした小説出すくらいじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I love him so much I even wrote a novel starring him.\""},{"lineNumber":121978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ザナゲス・ヘルマンの直系にして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Being a direct descendant of Zanages Herman,"},{"lineNumber":121979,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヘルマンの皇子……","translatedEnglishLine":"the Prince of Herman...I have countless stories I'd like to hear, heh heh.\""},{"lineNumber":121980,"originalJapaneseLine":"　聞きたい話はいくらでもあるわい、ぐふふ」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":121981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、クリーム殿には断られてのう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But Lord Cream declined me.\""},{"lineNumber":121982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐふぐふ……というわけで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh... so...\""},{"lineNumber":121983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頼む！　どうにか渡りをつけてはくれんか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please! Could you somehow arrange a meeting for me!?\""},{"lineNumber":121984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「断る。めんどい。なんで俺が」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No. It's a hassle. Why should I do it?\""},{"lineNumber":121985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなこと言わずに頼むー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't say that, please!\""},{"lineNumber":121986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　坊主しか頼る先がないんじゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're the only one I can count on, boy!\""},{"lineNumber":121987,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　すり寄るな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! Don't snuggle up to me!\""},{"lineNumber":121988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分かった分かった、言っとくくらいはしてやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, alright, I'll at least mention it for you!\""},{"lineNumber":121989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、マジか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, seriously!?\""},{"lineNumber":121990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジマジ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really, really.\""},{"lineNumber":121991,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃほーい！　やったぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay! I did it!\""},{"lineNumber":121992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どんな話を聞こうかなー！　うひひのひー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder what stories I'll hear! Hehehe!\""},{"lineNumber":121993,"originalJapaneseLine":"　るんたったー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"La la la♪\""},{"lineNumber":121994,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドエススキーはスキップるんるんと","translatedEnglishLine":"Doeski skipped away happily,"},{"lineNumber":121995,"originalJapaneseLine":"去って行った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and left."},{"lineNumber":121996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「爺がはしゃぐな、見苦しい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Old man, don't act so excited, it's unbecoming...\""},{"lineNumber":121997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだか、女の子とエッチするときの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow, you look like Lord Rance when he's about to have sex with a girl...\""},{"lineNumber":121998,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様みたいですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":121999,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はあんなんじゃないぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not like that!\""},{"lineNumber":122000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、なんじゃ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, what is it?"},{"lineNumber":122001,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂を唐突に呼び出して……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You suddenly called me out...\""},{"lineNumber":122002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、来たな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, you came.\""},{"lineNumber":122003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When?\""},{"lineNumber":122004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":122005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、いつだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I said, when?\""},{"lineNumber":122006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんじゃ？　なんの話じゃ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what? What are you talking about?\""},{"lineNumber":122007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様を主役にした小説は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm asking when you'll publish the novel starring yours truly!\""},{"lineNumber":122008,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつになったら出すかと聞いているんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":122009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":122010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーっ！？　そんなもん書くわけなかろう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!? There's no way I'd write something like that!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんにちは、ドエススキー先生」
「何してんだ、爺。
廊下でニヤニヤと……」
「む、坊主達か」
「さっきまで軍師のクリーム殿に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Up until just now, I was interviewing Lord Cream, the military strategist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: インタビューしていたところじゃ。
この次はウルザ殿じゃな」
「インタビュー？」
「ドエススキー先生はここのところ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems Dr. Doeski has lately been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々な方のところで話を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: visiting various people to listen to their stories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞かせてもらっているそうですよ」
「うむ！　さすが世界の中心だけあって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed! As expected from the center of the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々な逸話を持つつわもの共が集まるわい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: many warriors with various anecdotes gather here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人討伐隊なんぞに参加させられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Having been forced to join the Demon Slayer Squad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初はなんてことにと嘆いたもんじゃが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I initially lamented 'what have I gotten into?', but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取材と考えればこの環境も悪くない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thinking of it as research, this environment isn't bad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、むしろサイコー！」
「小説家ってのは、
みんなこんな変人なのか？」
「と、とても立派だと思いますよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I think they're very admirable, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前向きで……」
「お、おおっ！　そうじゃ！」
「坊主、あのパットンとも知り合いなんじゃろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Boy, you know Patton as well, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、パットンを知ってるのか？」
「儂、パットンの先祖である偉人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am a big fan of Zanages Herman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザナゲス・ヘルマンの大ファンでのう」
「ファンすぎて主役にした小説出すくらいじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I love him so much I even wrote a novel starring him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザナゲス・ヘルマンの直系にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being a direct descendant of Zanages Herman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの皇子……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Prince of Herman...I have countless stories I'd like to hear, heh heh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞きたい話はいくらでもあるわい、ぐふふ」
「が、クリーム殿には断られてのう」
「ぐふぐふ……というわけで……」
「頼む！　どうにか渡りをつけてはくれんか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please! Could you somehow arrange a meeting for me!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「断る。めんどい。なんで俺が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. It's a hassle. Why should I do it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなこと言わずに頼むー！
坊主しか頼る先がないんじゃー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the only one I can count on, boy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だー！　すり寄るな！
分かった分かった、言っとくくらいはしてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, alright, I'll at least mention it for you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、マジか！」
「マジマジ」
「ひゃほーい！　やったぞー！」
「どんな話を聞こうかなー！　うひひのひー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder what stories I'll hear! Hehehe!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: るんたったー♪」
ドエススキーはスキップるんるんと
去って行った。
「爺がはしゃぐな、見苦しい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Old man, don't act so excited, it's unbecoming..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか、女の子とエッチするときの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, you look like Lord Rance when he's about to have sex with a girl..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様みたいですね……」
「俺はあんなんじゃないぞー！」
「ふう、なんじゃ？
儂を唐突に呼び出して……」
「お、来たな」
「いつだ？」
「だから、いつだ？」
「な、なんじゃ？　なんの話じゃ？」
「俺様を主役にした小説は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm asking when you'll publish the novel starring yours truly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつになったら出すかと聞いているんだ！」
「はーっ！？　そんなもん書くわけなかろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? There's no way I'd write something like that!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザナゲス・ヘルマンの大ファンでのう」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I love him so much I even wrote a novel starring him."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being a direct descendant of Zanages Herman,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Prince of Herman...I have countless stories I'd like to hear, heh heh."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please! Could you somehow arrange a meeting for me!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「断る。めんどい。なんで俺が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. It's a hassle. Why should I do it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなこと言わずに頼むー！
坊主しか頼る先がないんじゃー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the only one I can count on, boy!"

分かった分かった、言っとくくらいはしてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, alright, I'll at least mention it for you!"

去って行った。
「爺がはしゃぐな、見苦しい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Old man, don't act so excited, it's unbecoming..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか、女の子とエッチするときの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, you look like Lord Rance when he's about to have sex with a girl..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様みたいですね……」
「俺はあんなんじゃないぞー！」
「ふう、なんじゃ？
儂を唐突に呼び出して……」
「お、来たな」
「いつだ？」
「だから、いつだ？」
「な、なんじゃ？　なんの話じゃ？」
「俺様を主役にした小説は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm asking when you'll publish the novel starring yours truly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつになったら出すかと聞いているんだ！」
「はーっ！？　そんなもん書くわけなかろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? There's no way I'd write something like that!"
